snippet.title: Echoes of the Deep Preview - Menu System
snippet.description:
A small preview of the menu system that has been created for my very first game, Echoes of The Deep. The game won't be technically amazing, but it's my first game, so it's special to me!
─────────────────────────
The game will be publicly available and playable on April 5th.
─────────────────────────
View the game soundtracks here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgvrYxHtvvE2FUtKbXX9DtaBXCidoMumY
